description: This file contains unit tests for the notification-related features of a React application, including permission requests, notification scheduling, and handling of specific events such as meal reminders and new recipe alerts.

classes.name: class (anonymous)
classes.description: Mock Notification API class defined within the setup to simulate browser Notification behavior.

methods.name: beforeAll
methods.description: Sets up a mock Notification API before all tests.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Prepares environment for each test, including clearing local storage, setting URL hash, and freezing time.

methods.name: afterEach
methods.description: Restores real timers after each test.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Individual test cases covering various notification functionalities.
